content.thinking: ユーザーが GitHub Issue #581 の対応を依頼しています。まず Issue の内容を確認しましょう。

input.description: GitHub Issue #581 の内容を確認

content.content:
title:	SEO: JSON-LD 構造化データの追加（BlogPosting, WebSite, BreadcrumbList）
state:	OPEN
author:	dOwOd
labels:	
comments:	0
assignees:	
projects:	
milestone:	
number:	581
--
## 概要

Google のリッチリザルト（Rich Results）で表示されるための JSON-LD 構造化データが欠落している。

## 現状の問題

- 記事ページに `BlogPosting` スキーマがない
- トップページに `WebSite` / `Person` スキーマがない
- パンくずナビゲーション（`BreadCrumb` コンポーネント）は表示されているが、`BreadcrumbList` 構造化データが出力されていない

## 改善内容

### 1. 記事ページ: BlogPosting

`src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx` に `<script type="application/ld+json">` を追加。

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "BlogPosting",
  "headline": "記事タイトル",
  "datePublished": "2024-01-01",
  "dateModified": "2024-01-02",
  "author": { "@type": "Person", "name": "dOwOd", "url": "https://dowo.dev" },
  "url": "https://dowo.dev/blog/slug"
}
```

### 2. トップページ: WebSite + Person

`src/app/page.tsx` に追加。

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "WebSite",
  "name": "dOwOd's logs",
  "url": "https://dowo.dev",
  "author": {
    "@type": "Person",
    "name": "dOwOd",
    "sameAs": ["https://github.com/dOwOd", "https://qiita.com/l_dOwOd_l"]
  }
}
```

### 3. 記事ページ: BreadcrumbList

`src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx` に追加。

## 対象ファイル

- `src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx`
- `src/app/page.tsx`

## 優先度

中

--
## 概要

Google のリッチリザルト（Rich Results）で表示されるための JSON-LD 構造化データが欠落している。

## 現状の問題

- 記事ページに `BlogPosting` スキーマがない
- トップページに `WebSite` / `Person` スキーマがない
- パンくずナビゲーション（`BreadCrumb` コンポーネント）は表示されているが、`BreadcrumbList` 構造化データが出力されていない

## 改善内容

### 1. 記事ページ: BlogPosting

`src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx` に `<script type="application/ld+json">` を追加。

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "BlogPosting",
  "headline": "記事タイトル",
  "datePublished": "2024-01-01",
  "dateModified": "2024-01-02",
  "author": { "@type": "Person", "name": "dOwOd", "url": "https://dowo.dev" },
  "url": "https://dowo.dev/blog/slug"
}
```

### 2. トップページ: WebSite + Person

`src/app/page.tsx` に追加。

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "WebSite",
  "name": "dOwOd's logs",
  "url": "https://dowo.dev",
  "author": {
    "@type": "Person",
    "name": "dOwOd",
    "sameAs": ["https://github.com/dOwOd", "https://qiita.com/l_dOwOd_l"]
  }
}
```

### 3. 記事ページ: BreadcrumbList

`src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx` に追加。

## 対象ファイル

- `src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx`
- `src/app/page.tsx`

## 優先度

中

content.content:
1→import { Metadata } from 'next'
     2→import { initializeApollo } from 'src/lib/apolloClient'
     3→import { GET_ARTICLE_BY_SLUG, GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS } from 'src/queries/queries'
     4→import { GetArticleBySlugQuery, GetArticlesByStatusQuery } from 'src/gql/graphql'
     5→import { Article } from 'src/components/Article'
     6→import { PageTitle } from 'src/components/PageTitle'
     7→import { notFound } from 'next/navigation'
     8→
     9→type Props = {
    10→  params: Promise<{
    11→    slug: string
    12→  }>
    13→}
    14→
    15→export const generateStaticParams = async () => {
    16→  const { data } = await initializeApollo().query<GetArticlesByStatusQuery>({
    17→    query: GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS,
    18→    variables: { status: 'public' },
    19→  })
    20→  if (!data) return []
    21→  return data.articles.map((article) => ({ slug: article.slug }))
    22→}
    23→
    24→export async function generateMetadata(props: Props): Promise<Metadata> {
    25→  const params = await props.params
    26→  const { data } = await initializeApollo().query<GetArticleBySlugQuery>({
    27→    query: GET_ARTICLE_BY_SLUG,
    28→    variables: { slug: params.slug },
    29→  })
    30→
    31→  const article = data?.articles[0]
    32→  if (!article) {
    33→    return { title: 'Not Found' }
    34→  }
    35→
    36→  return {
    37→    title: article.title,
    38→  }
    39→}
    40→
    41→const Page = async (props: Props) => {
    42→  const params = await props.params;
    43→  const { data } = await initializeApollo().query<GetArticleBySlugQuery>({
    44→    query: GET_ARTICLE_BY_SLUG,
    45→    variables: { slug: params.slug },
    46→  })
    47→
    48→  const article = data?.articles[0]
    49→  if (!article) return notFound()
    50→
    51→
    52→  return (
    53→    <>
    54→      <PageTitle title={article.title} />
    55→      <Article article={article} />
    56→    </>
    57→  )
    58→}
    59→
    60→export default Page
    61→

1→import { TopIcon } from 'src/components/TopIcon' 2→import { Accounts } from 'src/components/Accounts' 3→import { Profile } from 'src/components/Profile' 4→import style from './index.module.css' 5→import { Metadata } from 'next' 6→import { initializeApollo } from 'src/lib/apolloClient' 7→import { GetArticlesByStatusQuery } from 'src/gql/graphql' 8→import { GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS } from 'src/queries/queries' 9→import Link from 'next/link' 10→import { dateFromat } from 'src/lib/utils/DateFormat' 11→import { FaPencilAlt } from 'react-icons/fa' 12→ 13→export const metadata: Metadata = { 14→ title: "dOwOd's logs", 15→} 16→ 17→const Page = async () => { 18→ const result = await initializeApollo().query({ 19→ query: GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS, 20→ variables: { status: 'public' }, 21→ }) 22→ const data = result.data as GetArticlesByStatusQuery 23→ 24→ return ( 25→

import { TopIcon } from 'src/components/TopIcon' import { Accounts } from 'src/components/Accounts' import { Profile } from 'src/components/Profile' import style from './index.module.css' import { Metadata } from 'next' import { initializeApollo } from 'src/lib/apolloClient' import { GetArticlesByStatusQuery } from 'src/gql/graphql' import { GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS } from 'src/queries/queries' import Link from 'next/link' import { dateFromat } from 'src/lib/utils/DateFormat' import { FaPencilAlt } from 'react-icons/fa' export const metadata: Metadata = { title: "dOwOd's logs", } const Page = async () => { const result = await initializeApollo().query({ query: GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS, variables: { status: 'public' }, }) const data = result.data as GetArticlesByStatusQuery return (

Blog

{data.articles.map((article) => (
<>

{article.title}

{dateFromat(article.created_at, '-')}
))}
) } export default Page

content.thinking: Let me also check the article type to understand the available fields.

content.text: 記事データの型を確認します。

input.description: Issue #581 用のブランチを作成

content.thinking:
Now I have all the information I need. Let me implement the JSON-LD structured data.

For the blog article page (`src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx`):
1. `BlogPosting` schema
2. `BreadcrumbList` schema

For the top page (`src/app/page.tsx`):
1. `WebSite` + `Person` schema

The article type has: `content`, `created_at`, `id`, `slug`, `status`, `title`, `updated_at`.

Let me implement this now. I'll keep it simple and follow the Issue's specifications exactly.

content.text: 型とデータ構造を確認できました。実装します。

import { TopIcon } from 'src/components/TopIcon' import { Accounts } from 'src/components/Accounts' import { Profile } from 'src/components/Profile' import style from './index.module.css' import { Metadata } from 'next' import { initializeApollo } from 'src/lib/apolloClient' import { GetArticlesByStatusQuery } from 'src/gql/graphql' import { GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS } from 'src/queries/queries' import Link from 'next/link' import { dateFromat } from 'src/lib/utils/DateFormat' import { FaPencilAlt } from 'react-icons/fa' export const metadata: Metadata = { title: "dOwOd's logs", } const Page = async () => { const result = await initializeApollo().query({ query: GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS, variables: { status: 'public' }, }) const data = result.data as GetArticlesByStatusQuery return (

Blog

{data.articles.map((article) => (
<>

{article.title}

{dateFromat(article.created_at, '-')}
))}
) } export default Page

content.text: ESLint は既存の環境互換性の問題でエラーが出ています（私の変更とは無関係）。ビルドで検証します。

content.content:
1→import { Metadata } from 'next'
     2→import { initializeApollo } from 'src/lib/apolloClient'
     3→import { GET_ARTICLE_BY_SLUG, GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS } from 'src/queries/queries'
     4→import { GetArticleBySlugQuery, GetArticlesByStatusQuery } from 'src/gql/graphql'
     5→import { Article } from 'src/components/Article'
     6→import { PageTitle } from 'src/components/PageTitle'
     7→import { notFound } from 'next/navigation'
     8→
     9→type Props = {
    10→  params: Promise<{
    11→    slug: string
    12→  }>
    13→}
    14→
    15→export const generateStaticParams = async () => {
    16→  const { data } = await initializeApollo().query<GetArticlesByStatusQuery>({
    17→    query: GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS,
    18→    variables: { status: 'public' },
    19→  })
    20→  if (!data) return []
    21→  return data.articles.map((article) => ({ slug: article.slug }))
    22→}
    23→
    24→export async function generateMetadata(props: Props): Promise<Metadata> {
    25→  const params = await props.params
    26→  const { data } = await initializeApollo().query<GetArticleBySlugQuery>({
    27→    query: GET_ARTICLE_BY_SLUG,
    28→    variables: { slug: params.slug },
    29→  })
    30→
    31→  const article = data?.articles[0]
    32→  if (!article) {
    33→    return { title: 'Not Found' }
    34→  }
    35→
    36→  return {
    37→    title: article.title,
    38→  }
    39→}
    40→
    41→const Page = async (props: Props) => {
    42→  const params = await props.params;
    43→  const { data } = await initializeApollo().query<GetArticleBySlugQuery>({
    44→    query: GET_ARTICLE_BY_SLUG,
    45→    variables: { slug: params.slug },
    46→  })
    47→
    48→  const article = data?.articles[0]
    49→  if (!article) return notFound()
    50→
    51→
    52→  const blogPostingJsonLd = {
    53→    '@context': 'https://schema.org',
    54→    '@type': 'BlogPosting',
    55→    headline: article.title,
    56→    datePublished: article.created_at,
    57→    dateModified: article.updated_at,
    58→    author: { '@type': 'Person', name: 'dOwOd', url: 'https://dowo.dev' },
    59→    url: `https://dowo.dev/blog/${params.slug}`,
    60→  }
    61→
    62→  const breadcrumbJsonLd = {
    63→    '@context': 'https://schema.org',
    64→    '@type': 'BreadcrumbList',
    65→    itemListElement: [
    66→      {
    67→        '@type': 'ListItem',
    68→        position: 1,
    69→        name: 'Home',
    70→        item: 'https://dowo.dev',
    71→      },
    72→      {
    73→        '@type': 'ListItem',
    74→        position: 2,
    75→        name: article.title,
    76→        item: `https://dowo.dev/blog/${params.slug}`,
    77→      },
    78→    ],
    79→  }
    80→
    81→  return (
    82→    <>
    83→      <script
    84→        type="application/ld+json"
    85→        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(blogPostingJsonLd) }}
    86→      />
    87→      <script
    88→        type="application/ld+json"
    89→        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(breadcrumbJsonLd) }}
    90→      />
    91→      <PageTitle title={article.title} />
    92→      <Article article={article} />
    93→    </>
    94→  )
    95→}
    96→
    97→export default Page
    98→

file.content: import { TopIcon } from 'src/components/TopIcon' import { Accounts } from 'src/components/Accounts' import { Profile } from 'src/components/Profile' import style from './index.module.css' import { Metadata } from 'next' import { initializeApollo } from 'src/lib/apolloClient' import { GetArticlesByStatusQuery } from 'src/gql/graphql' import { GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS } from 'src/queries/queries' import Link from 'next/link' import { dateFromat } from 'src/lib/utils/DateFormat' import { FaPencilAlt } from 'react-icons/fa' export const metadata: Metadata = { title: "dOwOd's logs", } const Page = async () => { const result = await initializeApollo().query({ query: GET_ARTICLES_BY_STATUS, variables: { status: 'public' }, }) const data = result.data as GetArticlesByStatusQuery const webSiteJsonLd = { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'WebSite', name: "dOwOd's logs", url: 'https://dowo.dev', author: { '@type': 'Person', name: 'dOwOd', sameAs: ['https://github.com/dOwOd', 'https://qiita.com/l_dOwOd_l'], }, } return (

content.text:
実装完了です。変更内容をまとめます。

**変更内容:**

1. **`src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx`** - 記事ページに2つの JSON-LD を追加
   - `BlogPosting`: headline, datePublished, dateModified, author, url
   - `BreadcrumbList`: Home → 記事タイトル の2階層

2. **`src/app/page.tsx`** - トップページに JSON-LD を追加
   - `WebSite` + `Person`（author）: サイト名, URL, sameAs リンク

コミットしますか？

content.content:
diff --git a/src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx b/src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx
index 017d7c7..93a0186 100644
--- a/src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx
+++ b/src/app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx
@@ -49,8 +49,45 @@ const Page = async (props: Props) => {
   if (!article) return notFound()
 
 
+  const blogPostingJsonLd = {
+    '@context': 'https://schema.org',
+    '@type': 'BlogPosting',
+    headline: article.title,
+    datePublished: article.created_at,
+    dateModified: article.updated_at,
+    author: { '@type': 'Person', name: 'dOwOd', url: 'https://dowo.dev' },
+    url: `https://dowo.dev/blog/${params.slug}`,
+  }
+
+  const breadcrumbJsonLd = {
+    '@context': 'https://schema.org',
+    '@type': 'BreadcrumbList',
+    itemListElement: [
+      {
+        '@type': 'ListItem',
+        position: 1,
+        name: 'Home',
+        item: 'https://dowo.dev',
+      },
+      {
+        '@type': 'ListItem',
+        position: 2,
+        name: article.title,
+        item: `https://dowo.dev/blog/${params.slug}`,
+      },
+    ],
+  }
+
   return (
     <>
+      <script
+        type="application/ld+json"
+        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(blogPostingJsonLd) }}
+      />
+      <script
+        type="application/ld+json"
+        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(breadcrumbJsonLd) }}
+      />
       <PageTitle title={article.title} />
       <Article article={article} />
     </>
diff --git a/src/app/page.tsx b/src/app/page.tsx
index b7b344f..90644de 100644
--- a/src/app/page.tsx
+++ b/src/app/page.tsx
@@ -21,8 +21,24 @@ const Page = async () => {
   })
   const data = result.data as GetArticlesByStatusQuery
 
+  const webSiteJsonLd = {
+    '@context': 'https://schema.org',
+    '@type': 'WebSite',
+    name: "dOwOd's logs",
+    url: 'https://dowo.dev',
+    author: {
+      '@type': 'Person',
+      name: 'dOwOd',
+      sameAs: ['https://github.com/dOwOd', 'https://qiita.com/l_dOwOd_l'],
+    },
+  }
+
   return (
     <div className={style.topList}>
+      <script
+        type="application/ld+json"
+        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: JSON.stringify(webSiteJsonLd) }}
+      />
       <TopIcon />
       <Accounts />
       <Profile />

input.command:
git add src/app/blog/\[slug\]/page.tsx src/app/page.tsx && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Add: JSON-LD 構造化データを追加（BlogPosting, WebSite, BreadcrumbList）

- 記事ページに BlogPosting と BreadcrumbList の JSON-LD を追加
- トップページに WebSite + Person の JSON-LD を追加

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
